forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
